email_chain.subject: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

I hope this email finds you well. I am pleased to offer you a freight rate for 5,000 MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms.

The vessel we propose is the OCEAN HARMONY, with a DWT of 85,000 and LOA of 220m. The laycan is set for 1st to 5th April, and the loading window is 48 hours. The initial freight quote is USD 45/MT.

Please let me know if this works for you or if you need any further details.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the offer. Given the current market conditions, I was hoping for a more competitive rate. Could you consider lowering the freight to USD 42/MT?

Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate per day?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best,
David Wilson
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

Thank you for your response. Considering our long-term relationship, I can offer a revised freight rate of USD 43/MT. The demurrage rate is set at USD 10,000 per day.

Please note that the laycan remains 1st to 5th April, and the loading window is still 48 hours. I trust this revised offer meets your expectations.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the revised offer. We can agree to the USD 43/MT, provided the laycan is strictly adhered to. Could you confirm the stem details and any potential delays?

Best,
David Wilson
Global Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear David,

I confirm that the laycan will be strictly adhered to, and the stem details are as follows: loading at Rotterdam on 1st April, with a 48-hour loading window. There are no anticipated delays at this stage.

Please let me know if you need any further clarifications.

Best regards,
Emily Carter
Maritime Trade Services

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for the confirmation. We agree to the terms and will proceed with the booking. Please send over the contract for review.

Best,
David Wilson
Global Charterers
